original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṁ dhārenti.
“kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṁ dhāressanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
analyzed: ▁kathañhi ▁nāma ▁bhikkhuniyo ▁chatt up ā han aṃ ▁dhār essanti ▁seyyathāpi ▁gihi ni yo ▁kām a bhog ini yo ti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: ▁ ass o su ṃ ▁kho ▁bhikkhuniyo ▁tesaṃ ▁manuss ānaṃ ▁ujjhāy antānaṃ ▁kh iy yant ānaṃ ▁vi pā c entā naṃ

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—

analyzed: ▁kathañhi ▁nāma ▁chabbaggiyā ▁bhikkhuniyo ▁chatt up ā han aṃ ▁dhār e s s antīti ▁pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṁ dhārentī”ti?
kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṁ dhāressanti.
evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—

analyzed: ▁yā ▁pana ▁bhikkhunī ▁chatt up ā han aṃ ▁dhār eyya ▁pācittiy anti

original: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī gilānā hoti.
Tassā vinā chattupāhanaṁ na phāsu hoti …pe…
Evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
“Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā chattupāhanaṁ dhāreyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: ▁yā ▁pana ▁bhikkhunī ▁a gilān ā ▁chatt up ā han aṃ ▁dhār eyya ▁pācittiy anti

original: yassā vinā chattupāhanaṁ na phāsu hoti.
tīṇi chattāni— setacchattaṁ, kilañjacchattaṁ, paṇṇacchattaṁ maṇḍalabaddhaṁ salākabaddhaṁ.
analyzed: ▁tīṇi ▁chatt āni ▁set a cch attaṃ ▁ki la ñja cch attaṃ ▁paṇṇ a cch attaṃ ▁ maṇḍal a baddh aṃ ▁ salāk a baddh aṃ

original: Agilānā agilānasaññā chattupāhanaṁ dhāreti, āpatti pācittiyassa.

original: Agilānā vematikā chattupāhanaṁ dhāreti, āpatti pācittiyassa.

original: Chattaṁ dhāreti na upāhanaṁ, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
Upāhanaṁ dhāreti na chattaṁ, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
